briefTitle: Management of Women With BRCA1/2 Mutation
officialTitle: Role of General Practionners in Management of Women With BRCA1/2 Mutation
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The rate of GP having sufficient knowledge of the adequate management of patients with BRCA1 / 2 mutation.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria

* Aged over 18
* Women
* Living in France
* Having a medical insurance

Exclusion criteria

* Men
* Dementia
* Non frenchspeaker
* Mental retardation
* Being the subject of a guardianship or tutelage measure
